note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
We at Mum.Gr are interested in all mums getting as much info as possible about being able to be a better mum. This is so that all children of mums can benefit from lots of love, and love others too. Presently, this is a young project, and in need of a lot of attention. In fact this project is finding its feet and learning how to walk.
Any ideas will be greatly appreciated.
name: Mum
